remmy 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Resolve a post report. Only a mod can do this.

Source: R/http-methods.R
lemmy_resolve_post_report.Rd

HTTP.PUT /post/report/resolve

Usage

lemmy_resolve_post_report(
  report_id,
  resolved,
  auth,
  .lemmy_instance = getOption("lemmy_instance", "https://lemmy.world")
)

Arguments

report_id

A numeric value.

resolved

A logical value.

auth

A character value.

.lemmy_instance

Default: "https://lemmy.world". Change the default instance by setting the lemmy_instance options().

Value

A list of length 1:
